import { Checkbox } from 'antd' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Rtable from './Component/Table' import { userSubmit , userDelete } from './Redux/Action' const App = (props) => { const [data , setData]=useState({fname:'',mname:'',lname:'',gender:'',country:'',city:'',language:[]}) const [userData , setUserData]=useState([]) const [index , setIndex]=useState("") const hendleOnChange = (e,language) => { console.log("eeeeeee------>",e.target.value) const languageData = data.language if (language === "language"){ if (e.target.checked === true){ languageData.push(e.target.name) } else{ const index = data.language.indexOf(e.target.name) languageData.splice(index, 1) } setData({ ...data,language:languageData }) } else{ setData({...data, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } } const hendleOnSubmit = () => { const Data = props.tableData console.log("Data---------->",Data) if(index === ""){ Data.push(data) } else{ Data[index] = data setIndex("") } setUserData([...Data]) setData({fname:'',mname:'',lname:'',gender:'',country:'',city:'',language:[]}) } const EditRow = (dat,i,r) => { console.log("iiiiiiiiii----->",i) setData({ fname:i.fname, mname:i.mname, lname:i.lname, gender:i.gender, country:i.country, city:i.city, language:i.language, }) setIndex(r) console.log("rrrrrrr------->",r) } const DeleteRow = (dat,i,r) => { const Data = userData console.log("userData------->",userData) Data.splice(r,1) console.log("spliceData------>",Data) setUserData([...Data]) } return ( <>
hendleOnChange(e)} />

hendleOnChange(e,"language")} checked={data.language.includes("BGMI")}>BGMI hendleOnChange(e,"language")} checked={data.language.includes("Free Fire")}>Free Fire hendleOnChange(e,"language")} checked={data.language.includes("COD")}>COD

) } const mapStateToProps=(state) => { return { tableData: state.data } } const mapDispatchToProps=(dispatch)=>{ return { userSubmit: (data) => dispatch(userSubmit(data)), userDelete: (data) => dispatch(userDelete(data)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(App);
